author: Simon Difford
description: Some Scotch whiskies benefit from the influence of maturation in sherry wine-infused casks. However, this cocktail amplifies the fortified wine influence way beyond what's possible from merely the aging process.
name: Scotch Adonis
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
